title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 653 - Interest And Penalties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 653 - Interest And Penalties

State Regulations
§ 653.1 - Interest penalty on underpayment of taxes in counties outside the City of New York
§ 653.2 - Interest and penalties on underpayment of taxes in counties within the City of New York
§ 653.3 - Special penalties
§ 653.4 - Interest due where a trust mortgage maintains an action to recover taxes paid by him
§ 653.5 - Interest due where New York State maintains an action to enforce payment of taxes
§ 653.6 - Interest on refunds of the mortgage recording taxes

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 653

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §171; art.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
